snippet: Creative thinking is needed to break the endless cycle of punishments and threats in order to disrupt the North’s nuclear program.
abstract: Editorial welcomes China's decision to join United States in proposing tougher sanctions on North Korea, but notes there is no reason to believe sanctions resolution will persuade North to curb its nuclear weapons program; maintains creative thinking is needed to end cycles of sanctions and threats that seem to have little effect.
lead_paragraph: Creative thinking is needed to break the endless cycle of punishments and threats in order to disrupt the North’s nuclear program.

headline.seo: Another Round of Sanctions on North Korea
headline.main: Another Round of Sanctions on North Korea
headline.print_headline: Another Round of Sanctions on North Korea
